description:
Chino is trying to take pictures of the other girls in their "natural state," but ends up capturing far more silly moments than serious ones. As the girls get back to work after taking plenty of pictures, Cocoa finds something strange tucked behind a framed picture in the café...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Takaramono wa Kimi no Ketteiteki Shunkan
The Treasure Is Your Decisive Moment
宝物は君の決定的瞬間
